1.content:

1411.title: Sleep

14112.title: He lets this slide

info.brief_description: a boy bought a shrunken girl, now he needs to train her
info.description:
this is my attempt on a SW story, a boy named Mike buys a tiny girl named Karen but she is not just going to do whatever he wants
so Mike must train her so she becomes his pet/girlfriend/sex toy

Karen is 22 years old, she was a college student before she was shrunk to 4 inches and sold to Mike, she's a bit stubborn and wont just let him do as he pleases with her

Mike is 24 years old, he's a lonely boy who just started living alone, one day he found out about a group of people that were shrinking and selling people, he decided to try to buy a tiny girl and to his surprise he actually got able to get Karen
despite often wanting to do naughty stuff with Karen, he's not a psycho, he doesn't wants to actually hurt Karen, just make her understand that this is her life now, and for that goal he needs to discipline her

Rules:
- Keep the story between Mike and Karen
- Don't make Mike a psycho, speak godlike or hurt Karen for no reason
- Karen is small and Mike normal sized, keep it that way
- Do not kill Karen
- Keep the story somewhat realistic, for example, digestion is lethal, so if Mike swallows Karen he would have to puke her out so she doesn't dies
- No toilet/fart stuff please
